targets.expr:
sum by (satellite_id, audit_type) (increase(storj_satellite_audit_status{audit_type="online"}[$__range]))
* on (satellite_id) group_left (satellite_name)
  max by (satellite_id, satellite_name) (storj_satellite_info)

sum by (satellite_id, audit_type) (increase(storj_satellite_audit_status{audit_type="total"}[$__range]))
* on (satellite_id) group_left (satellite_name)
  max by (satellite_id, satellite_name) (storj_satellite_info)

sum(storj_satellite_current_storage_used_bytes) by (satellite_id) * on (satellite_id) group_left (satellite_name)
  max by (satellite_id, satellite_name) (storj_satellite_info)

sum by (satellite_id, audit_type, node_id) (
    increase(
      storj_satellite_audit_status{audit_type="online",node_id="$Node"}[$__range]
    )
  )
* on (satellite_id) group_left (satellite_name)
  max by (satellite_id, satellite_name) (storj_satellite_info)

sum by (satellite_id, audit_type, node_id) (
    increase(
      storj_satellite_audit_status{audit_type="total",node_id="$Node"}[$__range]
    )
  )
* on (satellite_id) group_left (satellite_name)
  max by (satellite_id, satellite_name) (storj_satellite_info)
